ThemeT: Select the UI Theme for the displays
BlackListT: Prevent these custom Skill IDs from displaying
SmallIconT: Show smaller skill icons instead of the larger ones
ToggleKeyT: Toggle the display of the experience window
ShowUIT: Controls the display of the window
HideExperienceMaxT: Will stop the skill from showing once its hit its max level
ShowExperienceInfoT: Show experience numbers on the skill bar
ShowExperienceGainsT: Enable a separate window that shows how much experience you've gained when you gain it'
mainScaleT: Changes the box size, only accepts integer values between 1 and 6
ShowPopupT: Show popup when experience is gained for a skill
PopupMessageDurationT: How long the popup window will remain
ShowExpPopupTestT: Show a sample bar for alignment
popupScaleT: Changes the box size, only accepts integer values between 1 and 6
LevelUpSoundT: Enable to play a sound when the level up window displays
LevelUpMessageDurationT: How long the level up window will remain
